( michael conroy / ap ) to mr . harvey , arguments with the umpires were a part of the game , but there were limits and there could be no doubt about who was boss . " i would listen for 20 seconds , " he once told the new york times . " i would count to 20 to myself . and i would listen to everything you had to say . "
